tuv.seg: In 2010 a carbon tax was introduced in Ireland
Tugadh cáin charbóin isteach in Éirinn in 2010
The carbon tax applies to kerosene, marked gas oil, liquid petroleum gas, fuel oil, natural gas and solid fuels
Baineann an cháin charbóin le ceirisín, ola mharcáilte gháis, gás peitriliam leachtaithe, ola bhreosla agus le gás nádúrtha
The rate of tax on solid fuels from 1 May 2013 to 1 May 2014 was based on a charge of €10 per tonne of CO2 emitted by the fuel concerned
Méadaíodh an cháin charbóin i mBuiséad 2012 ó €5 go dtí €20 an tonna CO2 a astaítear ó bhreoslaí iontaise
The rate increased to €20 per tonne with effect from 1 May 2014
Téann an méadú i bhfeidhm ar pheitreal agus ar dhíosal do ghluaisteáin ó mheán oíche, an 6 Nollaig 2011
